entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #44674
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.3xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #44668
  • [VCPKG] Visual Studio Preview 5 v17.12 caused SDK Resolver Failure on Microsoft.Build.Vcpkg #44664
  • dotnet test doesn't forward build command line options correctly #44655

Closed

  • Could we add support for `dotnet tool update -g -all` #19650
    9.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44665
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-list: Fix char conversions #44661
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #44658
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #44657
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #44656
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add package source mappings unit-tests #44649
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build #44631
    untriaged

Merged

  • Remove additional TL characters from the dotnet run output special casing for tests #44442
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Gather test diag logging to track down nuget issue #44455
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Update branding to 9.0.101 #44660
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-list: Support for slnx #44537
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Outline of CLI UX/Option/behavior expectations for the dotnet CLI #43938
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [FIX] tool-install: Support --ignore-failed-sources flag correctly #44487
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Tools, 8.0.12
  • Set mediaType from http response if manifest mediaType is not present #44530
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers
  • [release/9.0.2xx] add `dotnet new sln --format slnx` #44538
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.405 #44653
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.308 #44652
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.112 #44651
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Update tfm of dotnet/format test project to current #44498
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the loc build to target 9.0.2xx #44563
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
    Area-Infrastructure, 10.0.1xx
  • Browser refresh and WASM delta applier refactoring #44539
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Create project templates target to 10.0 #44349
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Dotnet test integration (first part) #44268
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #44540
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workaround for issue 40015: nuget restore uses 'resource' instead of 'resources' #44612
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
